info.name: Youtube Dark Comfort Blue
info.description: Dark Style, with blue accents. Should work on all pages of youtube. Please read the Notes below. Check out the red version "Dark Comfort Red"! https://userstyles.org/styles/113534/youtube-comfort-dark-red
info.additionalInfo: The colored Progress bar only works on YouTube videos supporting the HTML5 video player. You must also have the HTML5 video player enabled on your YouTube account ( you can do that here ) Update (02 March 2017): - Small Bug Fixes Update (19 July 2016): - Small Bug Fixes Update (15 Apr 2016): - Fixed Video Upload Manager Update (14 Apr 2016): - Fixed small changes in comments - Fixed Live-Chat (Thanks to Icculus575) Update (02 Marchy 2017): - Small Bug Fixes Update (27 Mar 2016): - Fixed new like buttons Update (09 Mar 2016): - Fixed volume handler color change Update (21 Feb 2016): - Small fixes - Recoloring loading bar on top Update (19 Feb 2016): - Fixed comment section - Minor changes Update (18 Sep 2015): - Fixed colors player controls - Changed location extern images - Bugfixing Update (06 June 2015): - Fixed delete button in history - Fixed sidebar bug in wide view on high resoultions - Recolored Like/Dislike button after change from YT Update (27 May 2015): - Fixed wide view
